content:
Craft an item of type: oak_boat
inventory=[{"type": "ender_eye", "quantity": 11, "index": 14}, {"type": "infested_mossy_stone_bricks", "quantity": 64, "index": 18}, {"type": "stripped_oak_wood", "quantity": 2, "index": 19}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "orange_concrete_powder", "quantity": 25, "index": 28}]
thought: To craft an oak boat, I need to craft oak planks first. I have 2 stripped oak wood in my inventory, and will start by moving one of them to the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 19 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: oak_boat
inventory=[{"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "ender_eye", "quantity": 11, "index": 14}, {"type": "infested_mossy_stone_bricks", "quantity": 64, "index": 18}, {"type": "stripped_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "orange_concrete_powder", "quantity": 25, "index": 28}]
thought: The oak planks have been crafted and I can now move them to the inventory.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

Craft an item of type: oak_boat
inventory=[{"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "ender_eye", "quantity": 11, "index": 14}, {"type": "infested_mossy_stone_bricks", "quantity": 64, "index": 18}, {"type": "stripped_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "orange_concrete_powder", "quantity": 25, "index": 28}]
thought: To craft oak_planks, I need to place a stripped_oak_wood in the crafting grid. The only stripped_oak_wood in my inventory is in slot 19, so I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 19 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: oak_boat
inventory=[{"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "ender_eye", "quantity": 11, "index": 14}, {"type": "infested_mossy_stone_bricks", "quantity": 64, "index": 18}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "orange_concrete_powder", "quantity": 25, "index": 28}]
thought: Now that I have crafted oak_planks, I need to move them to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4

Craft an item of type: oak_boat
inventory=[{"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "ender_eye", "quantity": 11, "index": 14}, {"type": "infested_mossy_stone_bricks", "quantity": 64, "index": 18}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "orange_concrete_powder", "quantity": 25, "index": 28}]
thought: To craft an oak_boat, I need to place 5 oak_planks in a specific pattern. Therefore, I will start by moving one oak_plank from slot 11 to the top-left corner of the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 3 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "oak_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 6}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 12}, {"type": "ender_eye", "quantity": 11, "index": 14}, {"type": "infested_mossy_stone_bricks", "quantity": 64, "index": 18}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "orange_concrete_powder", "quantity": 25, "index": 28}]
thought: Now that all the oak_planks are in the correct position, I can craft the oak_boat. I will move it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
